items.name: Alien Artifact
items.description: A mysterious, otherworldly egg-like object, pulsating with an eerie light.
items.image: An egg-shaped artifact with a luminescent, translucent surface displaying a network of intricate, alien patterns on a dark background. The artifact emits a soft, unsettling glow, hinting at the lifeform within.

items.name: Torx Screwdriver
items.description: A durable tool essential for repairs and maintenance aboard the ship.
items.image: A sleek, metallic Torx screwdriver with a sturdy, ergonomic handle and a star-shaped tip, shown on a dark background. The tool appears well-used yet reliable, with a few scratches indicating its frequent use in ship repairs.

items.name: Wiring Harness
items.description: A complex bundle of wires and connectors used in the ship's electrical systems.
items.image: A tangle of multicolored wires and connectors of varying thickness, presented on a dark background. The harness includes several plug-in connectors and is essential for the ship's electrical repairs and maintenance.

items.name: Ship Schematics
items.description: Detailed blueprints of the Orion, crucial for navigating and repairing the ship.
items.image: A set of detailed ship schematics spread out, displaying the Orion's layout and systems on a dark background. The blueprints show intricate diagrams and annotations, essential for understanding the ship's structure and systems.

items.name: Access Key Card
items.description: A secure card granting access to restricted areas of the ship.
items.image: A sleek, plastic key card with a magnetic strip and a holographic ship emblem, set against a dark background. The card appears official, with a barcode and security clearance level indicated on it.
